title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should successfully update both the .java file and the another resource without any errors.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
